channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Help Shape the Microsoft Ignite Security Roundtable: Take Our Quick Survey
item.description: As we prepare for Microsoft Ignite, we’re building a focused, practitioner-led security roundtable and we want your input to ensure it reflects the most relevant and pressing topics in the field. We invite you to take a short survey and share the security topics, trends, and technical questions you want to see covered. Your input will directly influence the structure and substance of the Ignite Security Roundtable. Thank you for helping us design a roundtable that delivers value, drives insight, and reflects what truly matters to the security community! TAKE THE SURVEY NOW: https://aka.ms/Igni...
